Package commands

Class CommandHandler

java.lang.Object
commands.CommandHandler
public class CommandHandler
extends java.lang.Object
The CommandHandler is created for the playing part of command line interface. It gets an ArrayList of commands in string form from the IO object, invokes matching methods from Trader and Ship objects, and returns a report in string for the ReportPrinter object.

The CommandHandler is a command processor getting user's inputs from IO objects of io package and processes the inputs by calling matching methods from other objects.

Author:
Finn van Dorsser, Meng Zhang

  • Constructor Details

    • CommandHandler

      public CommandHandler​(map.World map, trader.Trader player, Ship ship)
      This constructor sets the values for all the attributes map, player and ship.
      Parameters:
      map - the current World object
      player - the current Trader object
      ship - the current Ship object

  • Method Details

    • processCommand

      public static java.lang.String processCommand​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> commandArguments)
      This method takes an ArrayList of string commands, separates the command name from its arguments and calls their matching methods.
      Parameters:
      commandArguments - An ArrayList including all the commands and arguments in string form
      Returns:
      the string report of implementing the command in the argument

    • processSailCommand

      public static java.lang.String processSailCommand​(java.lang.String destination)
      This method calls the sailing method of the ship object, iterate the string reports in the ArrayList returned by the sailing method and combine them into a single string.
      Parameters:
      destination - a string name of the destination island name
      Returns:
      a string report of the random events which happen during this sailing

    • processBuyCommand

      public static java.lang.String processBuyCommand​(java.lang.String itemName, int quantity)
      This method calls the buying method of the Trader object.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the string name of the item on sale
      quantity - the integer number of the item quantity
      Returns:
      the string report of the result of this purchase

    • processSellCommand

      public static java.lang.String processSellCommand​(java.lang.String itemName, int quantity)
      This method calls the selling method of the Trader object.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the string name of the item to sell
      quantity - the integer number of the item quantity
      Returns:
      the string report of the result of this selling

    • processViewLogsCommand

      public static java.lang.String processViewLogsCommand()
      This method calls the Trading log getter of the Trader object.
      Returns:
      the string report including all the trading logs

    • processViewShipCommand

      public static java.lang.String processViewShipCommand()
      This method calls the status getter, cargos getter and upgrade log getter of the Ship object, and combine them together to form a single report.
      Returns:
      the string report including the ship's basic properties, cargo status and upgrade logs

    • processVisitStore

      public static java.lang.String processVisitStore()
      This method calls the for-sale getter and for-purchase getter from the store object on the trader's located island and combine them as a single report.
      Returns:
      the string report including this store's items for sale list and items to buy list.

    • processRepairCommand

      public static java.lang.String processRepairCommand()
      This method calls the repairShip method of the Trader object.
      Returns:
      the string report of the repair command

    • upgradeCannonCommand

      public static java.lang.String upgradeCannonCommand​(int cannonNum)
      This method takes an integer of the cannon number and calls the upgradeCannons method of the Trader object.
      Parameters:
      cannonNum - the integer number of the cannons to be upgraded
      Returns:
      the string report of this cannon upgrade

    • quitCommand

      public static java.lang.String quitCommand()
      This method calls the remaining days setter of the Trader object and set it to 0.
      Returns:
      a string report saying "Goodbye!"
